choices: Use this new size power to execute her original plan & conquer all of humanity!
Use her new power to help make life easier for people.
Use it to have fun like only someone who's part squid can!
Hold off on the power for now. Just proceed with the day as planned.
other...
1.content:
The day started like any other. Squidgirl had woken up like she would any other morning. However, today she felt a little... different. She decided to go outside and do some stretches to help wake herself up. This was where everything went in a not-so-ordinary direction. The instant that she began her stretches, Squidgirl felt a strange tingling sensation in her body. She looked down to see the ground getting farther and farther away. It took a few moments for Squidgirl to register what was going on, but eventually everything clicked: she was growing! She quickly freaked out and began to worry about just how big she would get. As if responding to her thoughts, Squidgirl's body suddenly stopped expanding. She had already doubled in size by this point, and knew that something like this was not natural. She knew that if anyone saw her like this, they would freak out! She began thinking about how she could return to her original size, and reacting to her desires, her body shrunk back to her original size. Finally realizing that the bizarre size changes were being controlled by her thoughts, Squidgirl got a broad smile across her face.

"I wonder what I should do now... Either way, I ink that this could be really fun!"


What will Squidgirl do next?
1.title: A Giant Discovery

choices: Head into the city and begin her conquest in the most populated area available
Stay in the small beachside town and demolish more houses
Head out to the beach and terrorize anyone there
Search for a military base so that she can eliminate the biggest threats to her
Before she can do anything, someone shows up to interupt her
11.content:
Squidgirl immediately concentrated and grew to 43ft tall in the blink of an eye. Her new size, combined with the unique abilities she already possessed, made her confident that she could easily conquer all of humanity now. She looked around and saw a notably tall house to her right. Walking up to it, she smirked at what she had planned for it.

Manipulating her powerful tentacles, she began to effortlessly reduce the building to rubble. Squidgirl's many blue tentacles were ripping the whole structure to shreds, wrapping around the support beams and tearing them straight out of the ground. She watched as her mighty appendages slowly caused the house to collapse inward on itself. Squidgirl felt the surge of evil glee as the building which once towered over her had now been reduced to nothing but a pile of debris at her feet.

"This is so inkredible! I'm more powerful than I could have ever swimagined! Now it's time to finally get my squidvasion of humanity started for real! When I'm through with them, those pathetic shrimps will be begging me for mercy!" Squidgirl said, laughing as she looked out at the rest of the city.

What is she going to do next?
11.title: Let's give it a test drive.

choices: Wake up the Aizawas and show off her new power to them
Find Nagisa and give her a real reason to be afraid of her
Go swimming in the ocean at her biggest size possible
Play around with some of her friends as a giantess
Reader's choice
13.content:
Squidgirl thought for a few minutes about what to do. As she tried to settle on a plan of action, she was unable to think of any reasonable plans. In the end, Squidgirl decided that she was going to just goof off for now. After all, she just got this new power. If she thought of something good later, then she could do it then. For now, she decided that she wanted to just have fun viewing the world from a different perspective.

"I've got all the time in the world to take over humanity now that I have this tentacular new power! For now, I'm just gonna enjoy it for a squiddle while!"

And with that, Squidgirl decided to...
13.title: Rule 1: Have Fun!

choices: The argument woke up Chizuru, who was in her "scary mode" due to all the noise!
The argument woke up Takeru, who wanted to know why they were fighting again!
Squidgirl shows Eiko her new power uninterupted...
Squidgirl tries to use her new power again, but it won't work for some reason...
other
14.content:
"Hmmm... Well, I should probably wait until the others wake up before I start messing around with this... Who knows what they would say if they woke up and saw me bigger than their house..."

Squidgirl then walked back inside and prepared a plate of shrimp for breakfast. She had always enjoyed the taste of shrimp, no doubt due to he squid-like nature, and as she was feeling extra hungry this morning, she decided to grab a few more than she usually did. She wasn't paying attention to just how many she had grabbed, but she had actually taken more than twice as many as she normally did! Squidgirl had almost finished off her breakfast platter when Eiko woke up and entered the room. She was clearly still quite tired, and put her hand to her mouth as she let out a yawn. Walking into the kitchen, Eiko then noticed Squidgirl sitting at the table. She still had half a shrimp sticking out of her mouth.

"Hey Squidgirl, good morning..." Eiko mumbled in her half-asleep state.

Squidgirl responded without even bothering to swallow the shrimp.

"Hmemym Emimkom..."

"Don't talk with your mouth full, Squidgirl..."

Eiko's eyes were then drawn to the plate of discarded shrimp tails. She was shocked by how many there were.

"Holy shrimp, Squidgirl! Did you seriously eat all of those?! That many shrimp should have lasted you all day!"

Ika then ate the shrimp in her mouth and spit the inedible tail out onto the plate.

"Well excuse me... I can't help it if a massive growth spurt makes me hungrier than normal..."

By now, Eiko was confused... Squidgirl was the same size as always... Either way, it was way too early in the morning for her to deal with this, and she was getting rather annoyed.

"What the heck are you talking about! You're just as short as ever! I bet you're just making up excuses to sneak extra shrimp! At this rate, you'll have to pay us for more than just that massive hole you made in the Lemon Beach House! It's hard enough to afford your stupid shrimp all the time without you pigging out on them like this!"

"Oh yeah?! I'll have you know that I just doubled in size earlier today!"

"Yeah right... Then why are you still the same as you always are!"

"Duh! Because I couldn't fit into the house like that!"

"Oh come on! You expect me to believe that you doubled in size, and then just shrunk back to normal to fit into the house?!"

"I don't care if you believe it or not! It's true, no matter what you say!"

"Oh yeah? If you can really grow that big, then why don't you prove it!"

"Fine then, I will!"



what happens next?
14.title: A new power, but a normal day...

choices: Squidgirl turns back to normal, and the day continues as usual... mostly...
Squidgirl shrinks, but she stays taller than Eiko to enjoy the feeling of power.
other
143.content:
Squidgirl began focusing her thoughts on growing the way she did earlier, and she soon felt that familiar tingling sensation again. Eiko simply watched in awe as Squidgirl began to grow before her very eyes. She finally stopped at 10 feet tall, and her head was only inches away from the ceiling.

"I ink that I've made my point!"

Eiko was nervous around Squidgirl at this size, but tried not to show it.

"H-how the heck did you do that?!"

"I don't really know all the details about it myself... I just discovered this power earlier this morning... All I really know about it is that it seems to respond to my thoughts..."

"Hmph... Must be hard for you to control it then..." Eiko responded sarcastically.

"Hey, shut your beak! I wouldn't be talking if I were you!"

"Oh, what ever! Just hurry up and turn back to normal before you break something!"



what happens next?
143.title: Squidgirl's second growthspurt of the day

choices: Eat some more of them
Kill them off in a more creative way
Do something else with them
1431.content:
After this display of power, Squidgirl left to have a normal day. She decided to take the day off from her work at the Lemon and just have fun for the day. She had managed to keep her growth under control all day, and nobody but Eiko ever even noticed that anything was different about her. Eiko had allowed Squidgirl to take the day off so that she could have some time to wrap her head around what she had just witnessed, but she didn't want to tell anyone else about it just yet.

Everything went great for Squidgirl over the rest of the day, but suddenly things went wrong. As she was riding on the bus, a sudden jolt of electrical energy surged through her body. Her mind blanked out for just an instant, and her growth quickly spiraled out of control. She soon exploded through the roof of the vehicle. In seconds, the whole thing had all but disappeared beneath her massive feet.

Unlike her previous spurts, where she had grown slowly and focused on keeping her clothing in proportion to her body, this incident of growth was almost instantaneous. As a result, her clothing had been quickly ripped to shreds by her expanding form. Squidgirl now stood fully exposed in the midst of a crowded street. Without her even realizing it, her tentacles had begun to grab several people off the street. One flew right by her mouth, and she instinctively tried to bite down on it. As she caught her own tentacle in her mouth, a group of helpless people who were ensnared by it were dropped onto her tongue.

Against better judgement, Squidgirl swallowed the captive people. However, as the people slid down the moist tunnel of her throat, Squidgirl couldn't help but enjoy the feeling of their pathetic struggles coming from within her. Instead of being mortified by the fact that she had just eaten at least 5 innocent civilians as though they were common shrimp, she just smiled and giggled.

Squidgirl then surveyed the rest of the people who had been captured by her tentacles and decided to...
1431.title: Out of control growth

choices: Stop to take a look.
Don't pay attention to the distraction.
14312.content:
Squidgirl looked at the people trapped in her tentacles and thought of a more creative way of killing them. She brought one of the civilians up so she could look at him and proceeded to crush the life out of him with her tentacle. She then looks at the others but then something catches her eye.

Does she...
14312.title: Kill them off in a more creative way

choices: She regains her senses and lets her captives go.
other
14313.content: what else could Ika do with them?
14313.title: other options

choices: She gets extremely embarrassed and runs back home for a new dress.
She gets very annoyed and starts stomping on all of the puny perverts.
143131.content:
As Squidgirl was about to toss another batch of people into her mouth, she suddenly felt a shock similar to the one on the bus. She immediately came to her senses, and lowered her tentacles down to release her captives. Sensing that they were still quite terrified, she decided to try and apologize to them.

"Uh... Look guys, I'm REALLY sorry for that... I honestly don't know what came over me. Don't worry, I promise that I won't-"

Just then, a tantalizing aroma wafted into Squidgirl's nostrils. Taking a moment to inhale the scent deeply and enjoy the wonderful aroma, she looked down to the source of the smell. She quickly discovered a truck by her feet that was carrying a large delivery of crabs! Squidgirl began drooling at the sight. She immediately scooped up the truck with one of her tentacles and dumped it's driver into the palm of her hand.

"Hey little guy... Sorry for this, but I'm REALLY hungry right now!"

The man trembled in fear at that statement. He obviously thought that Squidgirl meant to eat HIM, but his fears were calmed as she set him down onto the roof of a nearby building. She then peeled the back of the truck open like a can of sardines and emptied all of the crabs into her mouth. The driver simply watched in a mixture of relief and confusion as this colossal girl chewed up his delivery and swallowed. Either way, better the crabs than him...

"*burp* Oh, excuse me... Thanks for the crabs, mister. You can have your truck back now. I'll try to pay you back later."

Squidgirl then placed the truck back onto the road below. She decided to help the man get back to his vehicle, so she lifted him off the roof with her tentacle and placed him gently next to the empty crab truck. The man quickly (and nervously) thanked her for letting him go, and then drove off as fast as he could. Squidgirl then looked around again to notice that many of the people who she had captured earlier were still standing around watching her. She then realized why; in all the excitement, she hadn't noticed that her dress was shredded in her most recent growth spurt! She quickly blushed and wrapped herself up using her own tentacles as a makeshift bikini.


What happens next?
143131.title: With great power comes great... CRABS!?

choices: "are totally awesome! Can you take me with you next time you grow?"
"could use a little practice. We don't want you losing control like that again!"
1431311.content:
Feeling incredibly embarrassed by the fact that she had been seen naked by so many people, Squidgirl immediately ran back home. She shrunk back to normal size and entered. She was greeted by a rather surprised Takeru! Takeru simply stared at Squidgirl, who was wearing a tentacle bikini in place of her dress.

"Ummm... Good morning Squidgirly... Uh, do I even want to know?"

"It's a long story! I'll explain later, but first I need to get one of my spare dresses!"

Squidgirl then ran upstairs and into her room. She searched though her closet for a very specific dress, and eventually pulled out one that looked almost identical to all her other ones. The only notable difference, aside from the fact that it was slightly tighter than her usual one, was that the markings around the sleeves, neck hole, and bottom of the dress were red instead of blue. Holding this dress up, Squidgirl allowed her tentacles to relax from the makeshift bikini form she was holding them in and quickly slipped into the dress. The reason she chose this particular one was because of the material it was made of; it was an ultra-stretchy and form fitting fabric that would expand along with her body on its own no matter how fast she grew.

"*sigh* I never thought that I would need to wear THIS dress... I don't really like the color scheme, but at least now I don't have to worry about an accidental growth spurt leaving me naked again... Sheesh... I just can't believe that actually happened! I've never been so squidding embarrassed in my entire life!"

Squidgirl then returned to the room below and ran into Takeru again. This time, she would be able to explain the whole situation to him... He was like a little brother to her, so he probably would think that this was the most amazing thing ever.

"Hey Squidgirly! Cool dress... It's a nice change from that same one that you always wear..."

"First of all, I don't wear the same dress all the time! I just have a bunch of different ones that look exactly the same... And as for why I'm wearing this thing instead of one of my normal ones, it's because I don't want to outgrow it and wind up naked again!"

"Ummm, I think you lost me there... How exactly did you outgrow your dress? You don't look like you've gained an inch..."

Squidgirl then began to recount her recent experiences. Starting with the discovery of her new power, and ending with her most embarrassing moment ever.

"So, you mean to tell me that you can change your size at will now?"

"Yep..."

"And that red-marked dress is able to grow with you?"

"Yep..."

"And you REALLY ended up naked in the middle of that many people?"

"Ye-Hey! Listen Takeru, I don't EVER want to speak of that incident again! You have no idea how embarrassing it is to be the size of a building, completely naked, and surrounded by all those people!"

"Well... Other than the 'size of a building' part, I've been there..."

"Wait, WHAT?!"

"Yeah... One time in first grade, I forgot to get dressed before going off to school... I didn't notice it until I was half way to school, but by that point I had been seen by at least a couple dozen people..."

"Wow... I feel your pain, buddy..."

"Well anyways, I think that your new powers __________."
1431311.title: This time, Squidgirl is ready for the worst!

choices: Bumps into Sanae, and decides to toy with the crazy stalker at a giant size.
Sees Kiyomi and her friends, and decides to show them her new power.
Gets bored, and decides to see just how big she can get.
1432.content:
"Hey, that's still way too big!", said Eiko as Squidgirl stopped shrinking at 7 feet in height.

"Why? This is a manageable size, and I won't be breaking anything!" Squidgirl said.

"You'll still scare off the customers!"

"It might actually lure them... Don't you ink so, Eiko?" Squidgirl responded

"Our beach house is NOT going to become some kind of freak show!" Eiko said angrily.

"Don't be like that! I'm positive I can work even more efficiently like this!" Squidgirl said.

She then began to walk away, but ended up hitting her head on the doorframe as she walked to the kitchen.

"Owch!" Squidgirl yelped, rubbing her head to ease the pain. Eiko simply laughed.

"More manageable, you said?" Eiko mocked her.

"Maybe you have a point... How about this then?" Squidgirl proposed, shrinking to 6'6''.

"That's still too much! How many people have you seen who were that tall?"

"Come on, Eiko" said Chizuru, suddenly walking into the room. "I think you should be more understanding with poor Squidgirl."

Squidgirl was overjoyed, as Chizuru's unexpected support was a major boost in the argument.

"Big sis, why are you siding with her? This is ridiculous!"

"I just don't see what harm it could do. Why don't we let this one slide."

"Mph! I don't think it's a good idea at all, but whatever" Eiko conceded.

"Thank you very much Chizuru, I really appreciate it." Squidgirl said, almost moved to tears.

"You're welcome. By the way Squidgirl, could you please go on an errand for me?" Chizuru said, writing down what she needed in a paper.

"Sure, I'll be back soon!" Squidgirl replied cheerfully.

Squidgirl then quickly ran Chizuru's errand so that she could have some free time. As she wandered aimlessly around on the beach, she...
1432.title: Reaching a compromise

choices: Chizuru attacks Squidgirl to punish her.
Squidgirl decides to ignore them and go have some fun with her new size.
Squidgirl's powers act up again, and she ends up shrinking back to normal.
1433.content:
Suddenly, Squidgirl’s growth started to go out of control. She ended up growing right through the ceiling (breaking it in the process, and soon the entire building) as she soon reached her maximum height of 43ft tall.

Eiko, Chizuru, and Takeru all ran outside just in time to escape the collapsing building. As they stared up at the giantess standing in place of their home, they all showed signs of incredible anger on their faces. As she stood in the middle of the rubble and looked down at the tiny Aizawa family below her, seeing their frustration as they glared up at her, Squidgirl knew she was in trouble.

“Now look what you have done! You just single handy destroyed our entire house! What are we going to do now?!” Eiko yelled out.


What happens next?
1433.title: Uncontrollable growth

info.brief_description: Squidgirl learns that she has the power to grow as large as a giant squid! Chaos ensues!
info.description:
<If you are reading this message, it means that this story is in need of new additions. I'm willing to offer 500 gift points for each chapter added. However, as I am currently very busy with college and other real life things, I may not notice new chapters for quite some time. If you want your gift points immediately, please message me that you added so that I can get back to you.>


(choice chapters are not included in the offer and you will not receive gift points for writing them.)


A giantess story Based on the anime "Shinryaku! Ika Musume". One day, Squidgirl wakes up to discover that she somehow gained the ability to grow to the size of a giant squid (that's about 43 ft. tall, just so you know). How will Squidgirl use this new power? Will she maintain the friendly, if not slightly mischievous, personality that she has grown into over the course of the show and use it to help people out? Will she take this as her ticket to fulfilling her original mission of conquering all of humanity? Maybe she'll just use it to go out and have some giantess style fun the way only someone who is part squid can. I'll leave it up to you.

Here's some info on the series for those who don't know about it:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ika_Musume

Also, for those of you who haven't seen this series and would like to, here are some links to where you can watch it:
Dub- http://dubhappy.com/anime/squid-girl/
Sub- http://anilinkz.com/category/shinryaku-ika-musume


Rules:

1) Squidgirl can only grow to a maximum of 66 feet tall. That is the largest (yet unconfirmed) reported size of a real giant squid. Her size can be anywhere between there and her normal size. She only has the power to grow to the size of a giant squid, and I don't want her to go beyond the that. You know what, screw this rule. Feel free to make her grow as big as you want.

2) Don't write one line chapters.

3) Keep the grammar at a point where I don't need an hour to decipher it. I want to be able to understand what I'm reading.

4) No male giants!

5) Remember: as her name implies, Squidgirl is part squid. Be sure to make use of her tentacles and other squid-like powers. I want to see her using her tentacles to tear buildings off their foundations, or using her squid ink to flood the entire town. Try to make her squid powers remain a common theme so that this doesn't become just another generic giantess story with no original concept. (not that I have anything against those stories, but that's not what this one is meant to be.)

6) Just to be clear, Squidgirl is only able to use her power to make herself grow. Not anyone else. Her normal clothes won't grow with her on their own, but she is able to concentrate some of her power on them in order to keep them in proportion to her body. I would like the general assumption to be that she always does this unless otherwise stated.

7) You can have other female characters grow by means other than Squidgirl's power (Cindy and the scientist guys invent a growth ray that only works on women, radioactive waste contaminated their dinner, whatever crazy excuse you want to come up with), just try to keep giantess Squidgirl as the main focus of the story for the most part.



In order to improve the reading experience, I'll try to correct any spelling and grammar mistakes I find. I also reserve the right to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken. If a chapter is too poorly written for me to fix, then it will be deleted. Chapters that I have to delete will not qualify for the GP reward.
